record.description: [Photograph of Hyde Park High School used on a program card of the reunion and picnic held in 1882 for students who attended the school from 1871 to 1875.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached to cardboard back;Check General Archives Files for more information on Hyde Park High School. A program of events is printed on the back of the photograph
